name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
text: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Mystical Elf
text: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
text: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

name: Baby Dragon
text: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

name: Ryu-Kishin
text: A very elusive creature that looks like a harmless statue until it attacks.

name: Feral Imp
text: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1
text: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue.

name: Mushroom Man
text: Found in humid regions, this creature attacks enemies with a lethal rain of poison spores.

name: Shadow Specter
text: Powerful in groups, this animal spirit can be found in the wastelands.

name: Blackland Fire Dragon
text: A dragon that dwells in the depths of darkness, its vulnerability lies in its poor eyesight.

name: Sword Arm of Dragon
text: This Jurassic juggernaut has a spine covered in sword-like plates, and a tail to split open skulls.

name: Swamp Battleguard
text: Gains 500 ATK for each "Lava Battleguard" you control.

name: Tyhone
text: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

name: Battle Steer
text: A bull monster often found in the woods, it charges enemy monsters with a pair of deadly horns.

name: Time Wizard
text: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you call it wrong, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to half the total ATK those destroyed monsters had while face-up on the field.

name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One
text: A forbidden right leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One
text: A forbidden left leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
text: A forbidden right arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
text: A forbidden left arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Exodia the Forbidden One
text: If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

name: Summoned Skull
text: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

name: The Wicked Worm Beast
text: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

name: Skull Servant
text: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.

name: インプ
text: 闇に住む小さなオニ。攻撃は意外に強い。ツノには注意。

name: Battle Ox
text: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

name: Beaver Warrior
text: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

name: Rock Ogre Grotto #1
text: Protected by a solid body of rock, this monster throws a bone-shattering punch.

name: マウンテン・ウォーリアー
text: 足場の悪い所でもガンガン動きまわる頑丈な戦士。

name: Koumori Dragon
text: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

name: Two-Headed King Rex
text: A powerful monster whose two heads attack as one.

name: Judge Man
text: This club-wielding warrior battles to the end and will never surrender.

name: Saggi the Dark Clown
text: This clown appears from nowhere and executes very strange moves to avoid enemy attacks.

name: Dark Magician
text: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: The Snake Hair
text: A monster with a head of poison snakes. One look from this monster can turn an opponent to stone.

name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
text: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

name: Curse of Dragon
text: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

name: Dragon Piper
text: FLIP: Destroy all face-up "Dragon Capture Jar"(s) on the field. If you destroy any, change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Attack Position.

name: Celtic Guardian
text: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

name: Illusionist Faceless Mage
text: Manipulates enemy attacks with the power of illusion.

name: Rogue Doll
text: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

name: Wattkid
text: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.

name: Griffore
text: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

name: サイガー
text: 守備は見た目ほど高くないが、ツノによる攻撃は強力だ。

name: Sangan
text: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Sangan" once per turn.

name: Big Insect
text: A giant ant that dwells in the jungle, it is powerful whether attacking or defending.

name: Basic Insect
text: Usually found traveling in swarms, this creature's ideal environment is the forest.

name: Armored Lizard
text: A lizard with a very tough hide and a vicious bite.

name: Hercules Beetle
text: A massive beetle with a tough carapace and a dangerous horn.

name: Killer Needle
text: A huge bee with exceptional strength that's particularly dangerous in a swarm.

name: Gokibore
text: A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.

name: Giant Flea
text: A massive flea that feeds on the blood of its enemies.

name: Larvae Moth
text: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by offering "Petit Moth" as a Tribute on the 2nd of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

name: Great Moth
text: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 4th of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

name: Kuriboh
text: During damage calculation, if your opponent's monster attacks (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle.

name: Mammoth Graveyard
text: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

name: Great White
text: A giant white shark with razor-sharp teeth.

name: Wolf
text: Dis alpha wolf yoozes his sense a smell ta find da enemy. 'ey, quit sniffin at my socks!

name: Harpie Lady
text: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.

name: Harpie Lady Sisters
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Elegant Egotist".

name: Tiger Axe
text: A fast and powerful axe-wielding beast-warrior.

name: Silver Fang
text: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

name: Kojikocy
text: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders.

name: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Petit Moth" on your 6th turn or later after it was equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

name: Garoozis
text: An axe-swinging beast-warrior with the head of a dragon.

name: Fiend Kraken
text: A giant squid that drags its enemies to a watery grave.

name: Jellyfish
text: An almost invisible, semi-transparent jellyfish that drifts in the sea.

name: Cocoon of Evolution
text: You can target 1 "Petit Moth" you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. While equipped by this effect, the original ATK/DEF of that "Petit Moth" becomes the ATK/DEF of "Cocoon of Evolution".

name: Kairyu-Shin
text: A sea dragon known as the King of the Ocean, it attacks its enemies with huge tidal waves.

name: Giant Soldier of Stone
text: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

name: 人喰い植物
text: きれいな花と思わせ、近づく人をパクリと食べる、肉食の花。

name: クロコダイラス
text: 知恵を持ちさらに狂暴化したワニ。かたいうろこで攻撃をはじく。

name: Grappler
text: A devious snake with a thick body that wraps around an enemy monster and squeezes the life out of it.

name: Axe Raider
text: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

name: Megazowler
text: Nothing stands in the way of this spike-covered dinosaur!

name: Uraby
text: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

name: Crawling Dragon #2
text: A powerful dragon with teeth that can grind almost anything to dust.

name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
text: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

name: Castle of Dark Illusions
text: FLIP: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Zombie-Type monsters by 200 points. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of Zombie-Type monsters continues to increase by 200 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

name: Reaper of the Cards
text: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

name: King of Yamimakai
text: Wields the power of darkness to destroy its enemies.

name: ダーク・キメラ
text: 魔界に生息するモンスター。闇の炎をはき攻撃する。

name: Metal Guardian
text: A fiend guarding the treasures of the netherworld, it's most at home in the dark.

name: Catapult Turtle
text: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.

name: Gyakutenno Megami
text: This fairy uses her mystical power to protect the weak and provide spiritual support.

name: Mystic Horseman
text: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

name: 鎧武者斬鬼
text: 一騎打ちを好む。一瞬のスキをついて、居合い抜きで攻撃！

name: Crawling Dragon
text: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.

name: Crass Clown
text: When this card is changed from Defense Position to Attack Position, return 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand.

name: Armored Zombie
text: This warrior blindly swings a deadly blade with devastating force.

name: Dragon Zombie
text: A dragon revived by sorcery. Its breath is highly corrosive.

name: Clown Zombie
text: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

name: Pumpking the King of Ghosts
text: If "Castle of Dark Illusions" is face-up on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 100 points. As long as this "Castle of Dark Illusions" remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of this card continues to increase by 100 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

name: Battle Warrior
text: A warrior that fights with his bare hands!!!

name: Wings of Wicked Flame
text: Crimson wings of fire make this a very lethal creature.

name: Mask of Darkness
text: FLIP: Target 1 Trap in your GY; add that target to your hand.

name: 転職の魔鏡
text: 悪魔の鏡。攻撃を受けても割れずに、ダメージを防いでくれる。

name: Curtain of the Dark Ones
text: A curtain that a spellcaster made, it is said to raise a dark power.

name: Tomozaurus
text: Small but vicious, this monster even attacks its own kind.

name: 風の精霊
text: 気ままに飛び回る風の精霊。機嫌が悪いと嵐になる。

name: Kageningen
text: He yoozes both a physical and a shadow form ta attack. So he's a tough monstah ta beat!

name: 手招きする墓場
text: 死者にさらなる力をあたえ、生ける者を死へとさそう墓場。

name: Goddess with the Third Eye
text: This card can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material mentioned by name on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other material(s) must be correct.

name: Hero of the East
text: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swingin' samurai from da Far East.

name: Doma The Angel of Silence
text: This fairy rules over the end of existence.

name: That Which Feeds on Life
text: A monster that feeds on the energy of other creatures.

name: Dark Gray
text: Entirely gray, this beast has rarely been seen by mortal eyes.

name: White Magical Hat
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

name: ナイトメア・スコーピオン
text: 悪夢を見せ、うなされている間に四本もある毒のしっぽを刺す。

name: Spirit of the Books
text: This wise spirit dwells in books, using its accumulated knowledge to defeat enemies.

name: 物陰の協力者
text: 物陰からこっそりと協力してくれる、かわいらしい小人。

name: Trial of Nightmare
text: This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.

name: Dream Clown
text: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

name: Sleeping Lion
text: A ferocious animal that sleeps all day. Sometimes it's better to let Sleeping Lions lie.

name: ヤマタノ竜絵巻
text: 絵巻のドラゴンが実体化して攻撃する。守備はかなり低い。

name: ダーク・プラント
text: 汚染された土と闇の力で育てられた花。とても凶暴。

name: Ancient Tool
text: A destructive machine discovered in the Ruins of the Ancients.

name: Faith Bird
text: This long-tailed bird blinds its enemies with mystical light.

name: 戦いの神 オリオン
text: 戦いの神と言われている天使。その戦いを見た者は誰もいない。

name: Ansatsu
text: A silent and deadly warrior specializing in assassinations.

name: ラムーン
text: 月に住む魔法使い。月の持つ魔力で相手を魅了する。

name: Nemuriko
text: A child-like creature that controls a sleep fiend to beckon enemies into eternal slumber.

name: ウェザー・コントロール
text: 天気を自由にあやつれる。山の天気が変わりやすいのはコイツのせい。

name: Octoberser
text: With the head of a fish and the legs of an octopus, this strange creature attacks enemies by flinging spears.

name: The 13th Grave
text: A zombie that suddenly appeared from plot #13 - an empty grave.

name: 聖なる鎖
text: 聖なる力で、動きを封じることができると言われている鎖。

name: 死者の腕
text: 混沌の沼から腕をのばし、生ける者を中へと引きずり込む。

name: Witty Phantom
text: Dressed in a night-black tuxedo, this creature presides over the darkness.

name: なぞの手
text: 空間をゆがませ、次元のはざまから腕をのばし攻撃をしかける。

name: 竜魂の石像
text: ドラゴンの魂を持つ石像の戦士。自慢の剣で、敵を切り裂く。

name: Blue-Eyed Silver Zombie
text: The beams from the eyes of this creature are said to turn enemies into zombies.

name: トードマスター
text: 何千年も生きているカエルの仙人。おたまじゃくしで攻撃。

name: デビルツムリ
text: 闇の力で進化したカタツムリ。手や足があり、速く動ける。

name: Flame Manipulator
text: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

name: Necrolancer the Time-lord
text: The one-eyed Necrolancer launches his onslaught from a dimensional ring that can appear out of thin air.

name: 風の番人 ジン
text: 風をあやつり、竜巻や突風を起こし周囲のものを吹き飛ばす。

name: 魅惑の怪盗
text: 黒いマントをはおるキザな怪盗。杖を振って、相手を魅了する。

name: Temple of Skulls
text: A mysterious temple of skulls and bones that pulls in unsuspecting enemies.

name: Monster Egg
text: A warrior hidden within an egg that attacks enemies by flinging eggshells.

name: The Shadow Who Controls the Dark
text: A shadow that dwells in the dark, paralyzing its opponents and rendering them harmless.

name: Lord of the Lamp
text: This spirit emerges from the mystic lamp and obeys the wishes of its summoner.

name: カクタス
text: 水中に潜んでいる、得体の知れない格好をしたばけもの。

name: Rhaimundos of the Red Sword
text: Armed with the Sword of Crimson Flames, this warrior can bind a monster with fiery restraints.

name: とろける赤き影
text: 体を溶かして足もとの影にもぐり、敵の真下から攻撃する。

name: 死神のドクロイゾ
text: 地獄の一撃で魂を奪おうとする死神。

name: Fire Reaper
text: A reaper with a flaming arrow that burns an enemy to a crisp.

name: Larvas
text: A fast-moving, bird-like creature that strangles opposing monsters with its long, thin arms.

name: Hard Armor
text: A living suit of armor that attacks enemies with a bone-jarring tackle.

name: Firegrass
text: A fire-breathing plant found growing near volcanoes.

name: Man Eater
text: Man-eating plant with poison feelers for attacking enemies.

name: Dig Beak
text: This beast coils like a snake, and strikes quickly with its snapping beak.

name: M-Warrior #1
text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior uses magnetism to block an enemy's escape.

name: M-Warrior #2
text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior is equipped with a tough, magnetically coated armor.

name: Tainted Wisdom
text: If this Attack Position card is changed to face-up Defense Position: Shuffle your Deck.

name: サファイヤ・リサーク
text: サファイヤの眼を持つけもの。幻影を見せ、混乱したところを攻撃。

name: ゼミアの神
text: 相手をだまして、破滅の道へと誘うことを得意とする邪神。

name: The Judgement Hand
text: An all-powerful hand that delivers ruthless attacks.

name: Mysterious Puppeteer
text: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

name: 太古の壺
text: とても壊れやすい大昔の壺。中に何かが潜んでいるらしい。

name: Dark King of the Abyss
text: It's said that this King of the Netherworld once had the power to rule over the dark.

name: Spirit of the Harp
text: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

name: Big Eye
text: FLIP: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order.

name: Armaill
text: A strange warrior who manipulates three deadly blades with both hands and his tail.

name: Dark Prisoner
text: This monster bends light to hide its image from the eyes of opponents.

name: ハリケル
text: 荒野で荒れ狂う竜巻。風の刃で相手を切り刻む。

name: Ancient Brain
text: A fallen fairy that is powerful in the dark.

name: ファイヤー・アイ
text: 炎につつまれた目玉。羽をはばたかせ、炎の風をおこす。

name: モンスタートル
text: トゲのついたこうらを身につけたカメ。とても凶暴で人になつかない。

name: Claw Reacher
text: Stretching arms and razor-sharp claws make this monster a formidable opponent.

name: サターナ
text: 敵を呪い、動きを止めることができる魔法使い。

name: アルラウネ
text: 花の中の女性が毒花粉をまき散らす。近づいてはいけない。

name: ダークシェイド
text: クリスタルから強烈な光を発して攻撃する。

name: 仮面道化
text: 死のおどりを踊りながら、手にするカマで敵を切りきざむ戦士。

name: ホーリー・パワー
text: ひょろひょろとしているが、聖なる力に守られている。

name: ジャグラー
text: 手品のような魔法で敵を倒す。ハトを出して攻撃もする。

name: コピックス
text: いろんな奴に変身して、相手をだましながら戦う戦士。

name: Fiend Reflection #2
text: A bird-beast that summons reinforcements with a hand mirror.

name: ヘルゲート・ディーグ
text: おなかに地獄へ通じる扉があり、召還もできる不気味なモンスター。

name: ファランクス
text: 上にも下にも頭がある、気持ち悪いヤツ。口からはレーザーを吐く。

name: レッド・エース
text: 死の呪いをかけてくる魔法使い。呪文を聞くと、気が遠くなる。

name: ララ・ライウーン
text: 電気を帯びた雲形のモンスター。何でも溶かす危険な雨を降らせる。

name: Key Mace
text: Enemies' hearts will melt at the sight of this small fairy's cuteness.

name: Turtle Tiger
text: A tiger encased in a protective shell that attacks with razor-sharp fangs.

name: Terra the Terrible
text: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

name: ドローン
text: ドロローンと分身して、はさみ撃ち攻撃をしかけてくる。油断するな！

name: アンモ・ナイト
text: 大昔から海を外敵から守っている、アンモナイトの戦士。

name: ゾンビランプ
text: 腕をロケットのように飛ばして攻撃する、アンデットモンスター。

name: Happy Lover
text: Enemies become overjoyed when struck by the Heart Ray emitted from the forehead of this tiny cherub.

name: Penguin Knight
text: When this card is sent directly from your Deck to the Graveyard by an effect of a card controlled by your opponent, unite your Graveyard cards and your own Deck, shuffle them and form a new Deck.

name: Petit Dragon
text: A very small dragon known for its vicious attacks.

name: Frenzied Panda
text: A savage beast that carries a big bamboo stick for beating down its enemies.

name: Archfiend Marmot of Nefariousness
text: An air marmot that has a nefarious horn and wings. It attacks by throwing acorns.

name: ゴースト
text: この世の成仏できない霊が集まってできた怨霊。

name: マキャノン
text: 大砲のような悪魔。目に見えない早さで目玉の弾を発射する。

name: ドローバ
text: ドロドロした、気持ち悪いモンスター。猛毒ガスを吐き、攻撃をする。

name: グロス
text: ムチのように長い腕で、少し離れたところでも攻撃できる。

name: Droll Bird
text: This monster stuns its enemies with a massive beak and ear-piercing wails.

name: Petit Angel
text: A quick-moving and tiny fairy that's very difficult to hit.

name: Winged Cleaver
text: Few can withstand the scythe-like arms of this dangerous creature.

name: Hinotama Soul
text: An intensely hot flame creature that rams anything standing in its way.

name: Thunder Kid
text: This monster stores electricity within his body, and can unleash it with catastrophic power.

name: Meotoko
text: Dis big ol' guy wit' a big ol' eye shoots a nasty ray beam right atcha!

name: Aqua Madoor
text: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

name: Kagemusha of the Blue Flame
text: Serving as a double for the Ruler of the Blue Flame, he's a master swordsman that wields a fine blade.

name: ドリアード
text: 森の精霊。草木の力を借りて相手の動きを封じる。

name: Two-Mouth Darkruler
text: A dinosaur with two deadly jaws, it stores electricity in its horn and releases high voltage bolts from the mouth on its back.

name: ソリテュード
text: 下半身がシカで、魂を吸うという大カマを持った獣戦士。

name: Masked Sorcerer
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, draw 1 card from your Deck.

name: Kumootoko
text: A massive, intelligent spider that traps enemies with webbing.

name: ミッドナイト・デビル
text: 深夜に現れる鳥のばけもの。呼び出すにはいけにえが必要という。

name: Trap Master
text: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

name: 呪われし魔剣
text: 身につけ、呪いに打ち勝つことができた者は力を得られると言う。

name: Skull Stalker
text: Foist he's gonna grab yer monstah wit' his claws, den attack again wit' his poizin stingah!

name: ヒトデンチャク
text: 汚染された水で狂暴化したヒトデ。口から溶解液をはく。

name: 森の屍
text: 森のぬしが倒れたあと、悪しき者の手により蘇った屍。

name: Hourglass of Life
text: This creature grants power instead of shortening life.

name: ウッド・ジョーカー
text: 嫌な笑みを浮かべた悪魔。手にするカマで、器用に攻撃をかわす。

text: You can only control 1 "Amazoness Tiger". This card gains 400 ATK for each "Amazoness" monster you control. Your opponent cannot attack any face-up "Amazoness" monsters, except this one.

name: Skilled White Magician
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves (max. 3). You can Tribute this card with 3 Spell Counters on it; Special Summon 1 "Buster Blader" from your hand, Deck, or GY.

name: Skilled Dark Magician
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves (max. 3). You can Tribute this card with 3 Spell Counters on it; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your hand, Deck, or GY.

name: Apprentice Magician
text: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on; place 1 Spell Counter on that target. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Spellcaster monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

name: Old Vindictive Magician
text: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

name: Chaos Command Magician
text: Negate any monster effects that target this 1 card.

name: Magical Marionette
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves. This card gains 200 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

name: Pixie Knight
text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, your opponent selects 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard, and places that card on the top of your Deck.

name: Breaker the Magical Warrior
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). Gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

name: Magical Plant Mandragola
text: FLIP: Place 1 Spell Counter on each face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on.

name: Magical Scientist
text: Pay 1000 Life Points to Special Summon 1 level 6 or lower Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck in face-up Attack or Defense Position. That Fusion Monster cannot attack your opponent's Life Points directly, and is returned to your Extra Deck at the end of the turn.

name: Royal Magical Library
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves (max. 3). You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card; draw 1 card.

name: Armor Exe
text: This card cannot attack in the same turn it is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned. During each of your and your opponent's Standby Phases, remove 1 Spell Counter on your side of the field. If you do not, destroy this card.

name: Tribe-Infecting Virus
text: Discard 1 card from your hand and declare 1 Type of monster. Destroy all face-up monsters of the declared Type on the field.

name: Des Koala
text: FLIP: Inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each card in their hand.

name: Dark Scorpion - Cliff the Trap Remover
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:●Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.●Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard.

name: Magical Merchant
text: FLIP: Excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a Spell/Trap, then add that card to your hand, also send the remaining cards to the GY.

name: Koitsu
text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Aitsu" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 3000 points. When it attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

name: Cat's Ear Tribe
text: The original ATK of your opponent's monster(s) that battles with this card during his/her turn becomes 200 points during the Damage Step.

name: Ultimate Obedient Fiend
text: This card can only attack if this card is the only card on your side of the field and if you also have no cards in your hand. The effects of Effect Monsters that this card destroys are negated.

name: Dark Cat with White Tail
text: FLIP: Return 2 Monster Cards on your opponent's side of the field and 1 Monster Card on your side of the field to their owners' hands.

name: Bowganian
text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

name: Granadora
text: When this monster is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned or Special Summoned, increase your Life Points by 1000 points. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you take 2000 points of damage.

name: Different Dimension Dragon
text: This card cannot be destroyed by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that does not target it. This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 1900 ATK or less.

name: Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Shinato's Ark". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand. When this card destroys a Defense Position monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

name: Mirage Knight
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Dark Flare Knight" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During damage calculation only, this card gains ATK equal to the original ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling. During the End Phase of a turn this card attacked or was attacked: Banish this card.

name: Berserk Dragon
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "A Deal with Dark Ruler" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. During each of your End Phases, this card loses 500 ATK.

name: Exodia Necross
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Contract with Exodia", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed by battle or Spell/Trap effect. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: This card gains 500 ATK. Destroy this card unless all 5 of these cards are in your Graveyard - "Exodia the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One", "Left Arm of the Forbidden One", "Right Leg of the Forbidden One" and "Left Leg of the Forbidden One".

name: Battle Footballer
text: A cyborg with high defense power. Originally it was invented for a football machine.

name: Arsenal Summoner
text: FLIP: Add 1 "Guardian" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Celtic Guardian", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #2", "Guardian of the Labyrinth", or "The Reliable Guardian".

name: Nin-Ken Dog
text: A Ninja dog who has mastered extreme Ninjutsu. Through hard training, it learned the technique to metamorphose into a human being.

name: Acrobat Monkey
text: An autonomous monkey type robot which was developed with cutting-edge technology. It moves very acrobatically.

name: Guardian Elma
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Butterfly Dagger - Elma". When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 appropriate Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard; equip that target to this card.

name: Guardian Ceal
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Shooting Star Bow - Ceal". You can send 1 Equip Spell Card you control that is equipped to this card to the Graveyard to target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

name: Guardian Grarl
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Gravity Axe - Grarl". If this is the only card in your hand, you can Special Summon it (from your hand).

name: Guardian Baou
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou". When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: It gains 1000 ATK. Negate the effects of monsters destroyed by battle with this card.

name: Guardian Kay'est
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Rod of Silence - Kay'est". This card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

name: Guardian Tryce
text: Cannot be Summoned unless you control a face-up "Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce". When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon the monster from the Graveyard that was used for its Tribute Summon.

name: Gyaku-Gire Panda
text: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field. When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

name: Blindly Loyal Goblin
text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, control of this card cannot switch.

name: Despair from the Dark
text: If this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your GY by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card.

name: Maju Garzett
text: The ATK of this card becomes equal to the combined original ATK of the 2 monsters you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.

name: Fear from the Dark
text: When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card.

name: Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:●Target 1 card on the field; return that target to the hand.●Look at the top card of their Deck, then return it to the top or bottom of the Deck.

name: D.D. Warrior Lady
text: After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that monster, also banish this card.

name: Thousand Needles
text: When this Defense Position card is attacked and if the DEF of this card is higher than the ATK of the attacking monster, destroy the attacking monster at the end of the Damage Step.

name: Dark Magician Knight
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Knight's Title" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.

name: Gagagigo
text: This young evildoer used to have an evil heart, but by meeting a special person, he discovered justice.

name: D.D. Trainer
text: A poor goblin that was sucked into a different dimension. However, he's doing his best with his new destiny.

name: Ojama Green
text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

name: Archfiend Soldier
text: An expert at battle who belongs to a crack diabolical unit. He's famous because he always gets the job done.

name: Pandemonium Watchbear
text: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, "Pandemonium" on your side of the field is not destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Sasuke Samurai #2
text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can pay 800 Life Points. If you do this, until the End Phase, Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated.

name: Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong
text: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:●Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the top of the Deck.●Send the top card of their Deck to the GY.

name: Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn
text: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:●Add 1 "Dark Scorpion" card from your Deck to your hand.●Target 1 "Dark Scorpion" card in your GY; add that target to your hand.

name: Outstanding Dog Marron
text: When this card is sent to your GY: Shuffle it into your Deck.

name: Great Maju Garzett

name: Iron Blacksmith Kotetsu
text: FLIP: Add 1 Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand.

name: Goblin of Greed
text: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, neither player can activate an effect by discarding from his/her hand.

name: Mefist the Infernal General
text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Make your opponent discard 1 random card.

name: Vilepawn Archfiend
text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, your opponent cannot attack any Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field except "Vilepawn Archfiend".

name: Shadowknight Archfiend
text: The controller of this card pays 900 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent is halved.

name: Darkbishop Archfiend
text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, 3, or 6, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card.

name: Desrook Archfiend
text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. When a "Terrorking Archfiend" on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon the "Terrorking Archfiend".

name: Infernalqueen Archfiend
text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, during each Standby Phase, increase the ATK of 1 Archfiend Monster Card by 1000 points until the End Phase.

name: Terrorking Archfiend
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned unless you have an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field. The controller of this card pays 800 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. The effects of an Effect Monster that this card destroyed as a result of battle are negated.

name: Skull Archfiend of Lightning
text: During each of your Standby Phases, you must pay 500 Life Points (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed. Before resolving an opponent's card effect that targets this card, roll a six-sided die, negate the effect if you roll 1, 3, or 6, and if you do, destroy that card.

name: Metallizing Parasite - Lunatite
text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to a face-up monster on your side of the field as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, that monster will be unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards controlled by your opponent. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the monster that this card is equipped to is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

name: Tsukuyomi
text: Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand.

name: Legendary Flame Lord
text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Incandescent Ordeal". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand. Each time you or your opponent activates 1 Spell Card, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. Remove 3 Spell Counters from this card to destroy all monsters on the field except this card.

name: Dark Master - Zorc
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Contract with the Dark Master". Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die, then destroy all monsters your opponent controls if you roll 1 or 2, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls if you roll 3, 4 or 5, or destroy all monsters you control if you roll 6.

name: Nightmare Penguin
text: All face-up WATER monsters you control gain 200 ATK. When this card is flipped face-up: Target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

name: Perfect Machine King
text: This card gains 500 ATK for each other Machine-Type monster on the field.

name: Giant Rex
text: Cannot attack directly. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, this card gains 200 ATK for each of your banished Dinosaur monsters. You can only use this effect of "Giant Rex" once per turn.

name: Penguin Torpedo
text: This card can attack directly. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 Level 6 or lower monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase, but its effects are negated, also it cannot declare an attack, while you control it. You can only use this effect of "Penguin Torpedo" once per turn. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: Destroy this card.

name: Chiron the Mage
text: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target.

name: Ojama Yellow
text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

name: Ojama Black
text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

name: Soul Tiger
text: The soul of a tiger that is said to devour human souls. He is a famous soul that you wouldn't want to run into in a dark alley.

name: Big Koala
text: A species of huge Des Koala. He's meek, but people are afraid of him because he's very powerful.

name: Des Kangaroo
text: If the ATK of a monster that attacks this monster is lower than the DEF of this card, destroy the attacking monster.

name: Crimson Ninja
text: FLIP: Target 1 Trap Card on the field; destroy that target. (If the target is Set, reveal it, and destroy it if it is a Trap Card. Otherwise, return it to its original position.)

name: Strike Ninja
text: (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 DARK monsters from your GY; banish this face-up card until the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Strike Ninja" once per turn.

name: Gale Lizard
text: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

name: Spirit of the Pot of Greed
text: While this card is in face-up Attack Position on the field, if a player activates "Pot of Greed", they can draw 1 more card.

name: Chopman the Desperate Outlaw
text: When this card is Flip Summoned, you can equip 1 Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard to this card.

name: Sasuke Samurai #3
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent draws cards until their hand has 7 cards.

name: D.D. Scout Plane
text: Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is currently banished, and was banished this turn: Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position.

name: Berserk Gorilla
text: If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy this card. This card must attack if able.

name: Freed the Brave Wanderer
text: Once per turn: You can banish 2 LIGHT monsters from your Graveyard to target 1 face-up monster on the field with higher ATK than this face-up card; destroy that target.

name: Coach Goblin
text: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, you can return 1 Normal Monster Card in your hand to the bottom of your Deck during your End Phase to draw 1 card from your Deck. You can only use this effect once per turn.

name: Witch Doctor of Chaos
text: FLIP: Select 1 Monster Card from you or your opponent's Graveyard. Remove it from play.

name: Chaos Necromancer
text: The ATK of this card is the number of Monster Cards in your Graveyard x 300.

name: Chaosrider Gustaph
text: Once per turn, you can remove from play up to 2 Spell Cards from your Graveyard. This card gains 300 ATK for each card removed, until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Inferno
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 FIRE monster from your GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.

name: Fenrir
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing 2 WATER monsters in your Graveyard from play. When this card destroys an opponent's monster as a result of battle, your opponent skips his/her next Draw Phase.

name: Gigantes
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 EARTH monster from your GY. If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy all Spells and Traps on the field.

name: Silpheed
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 WIND monster in your Graveyard. When this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, your opponent discards 1 random card from their hand.

name: Chaos Sorcerer
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; banish that target. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

name: Gren Maju Da Eiza
text: This card's ATK/DEF are each equal to the number of your banished cards x 400.

name: Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Beginning
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects.●Target 1 monster on the field; banish it. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated.●If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It can make a second attack in a row.

name: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; send as many cards in both players' hands and on the field as possible to the GY, then inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card sent to the opponent's GY by this effect. You cannot activate other cards or effects during the turn you activate this card's effect.

name: Victory Dragon
text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Dragon-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

name: Magician's Valkyria
text: Monsters your opponent controls cannot target face-up Spellcaster-Type monsters for attacks, except this one.

name: Giga Gagagigo
text: In order to fight tremendous evil, he gained formidable power through body reconstruction, but lost his heart and his redemption.

name: Mad Dog of Darkness
text: He used to be a normal dog who played around in a park, but was corrupted by the powers of darkness.

name: Neo Bug
text: A huge bug-like monster said to come from another planet. It gathers in swarms.

name: Sea Serpent Warrior of Darkness
text: A warrior who defends the world of the Sea of Darkness. He prides himself on his fighting prowess both on the ground and, of course, in the water.

name: Terrorking Salmon
text: A feared salmon, master of the Sea of Darkness. Its roe is the best delicacy in the World of Darkness.

name: Blazing Inpachi
text: A wicked wooden spirit now burning in flames. Its fire attack is powerful, but it will soon be nothing but ashes.

name: Burning Algae
text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, increase your opponent's Life Points by 1000 points.

name: The Thing in the Crater
text: When this card is destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Pyro-Type Monster from your hand.

name: Molten Zombie
text: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

name: Dark Magician of Chaos
text: During the End Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can target 1 Spell in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark Magician of Chaos" once per turn. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: Banish that opponent's monster. If this face-up card would leave the field, banish it instead.

name: Manticore of Darkness
text: During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn: You can send 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your GY.

name: Stealth Bird
text: Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

name: Sacred Crane
text: If this card is Special Summoned: Draw 1 card.

name: Enraged Battle Ox
text: If your Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Don Turtle
text: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can Special Summon any number of "Don Turtle"(s) from your hand.

name: Balloon Lizard
text: Put 1 counter on this card during each of your Standby Phases. When this card is destroyed, inflict damage to the controller of the card that destroyed it equal to the number of counters x 400 points.

name: Dark Driceratops
text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Hyper Hammerhead
text: At the end of the Damage Step, if an opponent's monster that battled this card is not destroyed: Return that opponent's monster to the hand.

name: Black Tyranno
text: If the only cards your opponent controls are Defense Position monsters, this card can attack directly.

name: Anti-Aircraft Flower
text: By tributing 1 Insect-Type monster on your side of the field, inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

name: Prickle Fairy
text: Your opponent cannot attack Insect monsters. If this card battled a monster, at the end of the Damage Step: Change that monster to Defense Position.

name: Insect Princess
text: All Insect monsters your opponent controls are changed to Attack Position. If this card destroys an Insect monster by battle: This card gains 500 ATK.

name: Amphibious Bugroth MK-3
text: As long as "Umi" remains face-up on the field, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

name: Torpedo Fish
text: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

name: Levia-Dragon - Daedalus
text: You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the GY; destroy all other cards on the field.

name: Orca Mega-Fortress of Darkness
text: By tributing 1 "Torpedo Fish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 monster on the field. By Tributing 1 "Cannonball Spear Shellfish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

name: Cannonball Spear Shellfish
text: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

name: Mataza the Zapper
text: This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. Control of this face-up card on the field cannot switch.

name: Guardian Angel Joan
text: When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK in the GY.

name: Manju of the Ten Thousand Hands
text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster or 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand.

name: Getsu Fuhma
text: If this card battles a Fiend or Zombie-Type monster, destroy that monster at the end of the Damage Step.

name: Ryu Kokki
text: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled a Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster: Destroy that monster.

name: Invader of Darkness
text: Your opponent cannot activate Quick-Play Spell Cards.

name: Twinheaded Beast
text: This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

name: Winged Rhynos
text: During either player's turn, when a Trap Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand.

name: Ulevo
text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by offering 3 Winged Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field as Tributes. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Brain Crusher

text: If this card is discarded to the GY by card effect: Special Summon this card, then, if it was discarded from your hand to your GY by an opponent's card effect, your opponent places exactly 2 cards from their hand on the bottom of their Deck, in any order.

name: Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World

name: Scarr, Scout of Dark World
text: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Dark World" monster from your Deck to your hand.

name: Familiar-Possessed - Aussa
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or Deck) by sending 1 face-up "Aussa the Earth Charmer" and 1 face-up EARTH monster you control to the GY. If this card Special Summoned by its own effect attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Familiar-Possessed - Eria
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or Deck) by sending 1 face-up "Eria the Water Charmer" and 1 face-up WATER monster you control to the GY. If this card Special Summoned by its own effect attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Familiar-Possessed - Hiita
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or Deck) by sending 1 face-up "Hiita the Fire Charmer" and 1 face-up FIRE monster you control to the GY. If this card Special Summoned by its own effect attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Familiar-Possessed - Wynn
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or Deck) by sending 1 face-up "Wynn the Wind Charmer" and 1 face-up WIND monster you control to the GY. If this card Special Summoned by its own effect attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

name: Tualatin
text: If it is your opponent's Battle Phase, and all monsters you controlled at the start of this Battle Phase (min. 2) have been destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way: Choose an Attribute and destroy all face-up monsters with that Attribute. Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters with that Attribute.

name: Guard Mantis

During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Insect monster you control; change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Guard Mantis" once per turn.

name: Elemental HERO Necroshade
text: Once, while this card is in the GY, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Elemental HERO" monster without Tributing.

name: Dark Eradicator Warlock
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Each time a Normal Spell Card is activated, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent immediately after it resolves.

name: Mythical Beast Cerberus
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. Gains 500 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled, remove all Spell Counters on it.

name: King of Destruction - Xexex
text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Fiend-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Queen of Fate - Eternia
text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Fairy-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Armed Dragon LV10
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Armed Dragon LV7". You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

name: Lancer Dragonute
text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

name: Axe Dragonute

name: White-Horned Dragon

name: Tellus the Little Angel
text: If this card is sent from the Monster Zone to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Tellus Wing Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). While you control a "Tellus Wing Token": You can banish this card from your GY and 1 Spell from your hand; Special Summon 2 "Tellus Wing Tokens", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Tellus the Little Angel" once per turn.

name: Dark Red Enchanter
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 2 Spell Counters on it. Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. Gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. Once per turn: You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card; discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Gorz the Emissary of Darkness
text: When you take damage from a card in your opponent's possession: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You must control no cards to activate and to resolve this effect. When this card is Special Summoned by its effect: Activate the appropriate effect, based on the type of damage.●Battle damage: Special Summon 1 "Emissary of Darkness Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 7/ATK ?/DEF ?). Its ATK and DEF are each equal to the amount of battle damage you took.●Effect damage: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the damage you took.

name: Uria, Lord of Searing Flames
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 face-up Traps you control to the GY. This card gains 1000 ATK for each Continuous Trap in your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 Set Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target. Neither player can activate Spell/Trap Cards in response to this effect's activation.

name: Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 face-up Continuous Spells you control to the GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, monsters your opponent controls cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one.

name: Raviel, Lord of Phantasms

Each time your opponent Normal Summons a monster: Special Summon 1 "Phantasm Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), but it cannot declare an attack. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; this card gains ATK equal to the Tributed monster's original ATK, until the end of this turn.

name: Elemental HERO Neo Bubbleman
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending an "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" you control and "Metamorphosis" in your hand to the Graveyard. This card's name is treated as "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" while it is face-up on the field. Destroy an opponent's monster that battles this card at the end of the Damage Step.

name: Hero Kid
text: When this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon any number of "Hero Kid"(s) from your Deck.

name: Cyber Barrier Dragon
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Attack Reflector Unit". Once per turn, while this card is in Attack Position, your opponent's next attack is negated.

name: Cyber Laser Dragon
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Photon Generator Unit". Once per turn, you can destroy 1 monster with ATK or DEF equal to or higher than the ATK of this card.

name: Ancient Gear

name: Ancient Gear Cannon
text: You can Tribute this card; inflict 500 damage to your opponent, and if you do, neither player can activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase of this turn.

name: Proto-Cyber Dragon

name: Adhesive Explosive

name: Machine King Prototype

name: B.E.S. Covered Core

If you call it wrong, remove 1 counter. If this card battles without a counter, destroy it at the end of the Damage Step.

name: D.D. Guide

name: Chain Thrasher

name: Disciple of the Forbidden Spell

name: Tenkabito Shien
text: This card is unaffected by the effects of Trap Cards.

name: Parasitic Ticky
text: The ATK and DEF of this card are each equal to the number of tokens on the field x 500.

name: Gokipon

name: Silent Insect

name: Saber Beetle

name: Doom Dozer

name: Beelze Frog
text: This card gains 300 ATK for each "T.A.D.P.O.L.E." in your Graveyard.

name: Princess Pikeru

name: Princess Curran

name: Memory Crusher

name: Malice Ascendant

name: Grass Phantom

These effects cannot accumulate.●This card gains 1000 ATK.●If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.●When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

name: Ruin, Queen of Oblivion
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "End of the World". When this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can activate this effect; this card can make a second attack in a row.

name: Exxod, Master of The Guard

name: Great Spirit

The ATK and DEF of this card become the number of monsters that are removed from play x 200 points. If this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, this card will be Special Summoned during the End Phase, increasing the ATK and DEF by 300 points.

name: Helios Trice Megistus
text: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Helios Duo Megistus". This card's ATK and DEF are each equal to the number of removed from play monsters x 300. After this card attacks, it can attack once more if your opponent controls a monster. If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon it during the End Phase and it gains 500 ATK and DEF.

name: Elemental HERO Neos

name: Dandylion

name: Destiny HERO - Doom Lord
text: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish that target. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect. You must control this face-up Attack Position card to activate and to resolve this effect. The banished monster returns to the opponent's field during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

During the Main Phase of your next turn, you can activate the effect of that Spell in your GY (even if you no longer control this face-up card).

name: Destiny HERO - Dreadmaster

After this card is Special Summoned, for the rest of this turn, "Destiny HERO" monsters you control cannot be destroyed, also you take no battle damage when they battle. The ATK/DEF of this card are equal to the combined original ATK of all other "Destiny HERO" monsters you control.

name: Cyber Kirin
text: You can Tribute this card to make any effect damage you take this turn 0.

name: Cyber Phoenix
text: While this card is in Attack Position, negate any Spell/Trap effects that target 1 Machine monster you control (and no other cards). When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can draw 1 card.

name: Cyber Tutu
text: If the ATK of each monster your opponent controls is higher than this card's, this card can attack directly.

name: Cyber Gymnast
text: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

name: Cyber Prima
text: If this card is Tribute Summoned: Destroy all face-up Spells on the field.

name: Searchlightman
text: FLIP: Your opponent cannot Set (or flip face-down) any cards for the rest of this turn.

name: Victory Viper XX03
text: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Activate 1 of these effects.●This card gains 400 ATK.●Target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.●Special Summon 1 "Option Token". Its Type, Attribute, Level, and ATK/DEF are always the same as this card, but destroy it if this card is no longer face-up on the field.

name: Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Dragon
text: If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 of the following monsters, this card gets the appropriate effect:●Batteryman D: Negate the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that targets this 1 card.●Batteryman C: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.●Batteryman AA: This card gains 1000 ATK.

name: Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon
text: Gains effects based on the number of "Harpie" monsters you control, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".●1+: Your opponent cannot target "Harpie" monsters you control for attacks, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".●2+: Double the original ATK/DEF of this card.●3+: Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

name: Majestic Mech - Senku
text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Draw 1 card. During the End Phase of the turn this card was Summoned: Send it to the Graveyard.

name: Majestic Mech - Ohka
text: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If you do, during the End Phase: Send it to the Graveyard.

name: Majestic Mech - Goryu
text: You can Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card with 1 Tribute. If Summoned this way, during the End Phase: Send it to the Graveyard. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

name: Bountiful Artemis
text: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, immediately after it resolves, draw 1 card.

name: Royal Knight
text: When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, gain Life Points equal to the DEF of the destroyed monster.

name: Herald of Purple Light
text: When your opponent activates a Trap Card (Quick Effect): You can send this card and 1 other Fairy monster from your hand to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

name: Herald of Green Light
text: When your opponent activates a Spell Card (Quick Effect): You can send this card and 1 other Fairy monster from your hand to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

name: Layard the Liberator
text: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, immediately after it resolves, add 2 of your banished Fairy monsters to your hand.

name: Banisher of the Radiance
text: Any card sent to the GY is banished instead.

name: Voltanis the Adjudicator
text: After 1 of your Counter Trap Cards has been activated and has resolved, you can Tribute all monsters you control to Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned in this way, you can destroy cards your opponent controls up to the number of Fairy-Type monsters you Tributed.

name: Guard Dog
text: FLIP: Your opponent cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn.

name: Whirlwind Weasel
text: FLIP: Your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards for the rest of this turn.

name: Avalanching Aussa
text: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 EARTH monster (except this card) to Special Summon 1 EARTH monster from your hand. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed if "Avalanching Aussa" is removed from your side of the field.

name: Raging Eria
text: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 WATER monster (except this card) to Special Summon 1 WATER monster from your hand. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed if "Raging Eria" is removed from your side of the field.

name: Blazing Hiita
text: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 FIRE monster (except this card) to Special Summon 1 FIRE monster from your hand. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed if "Blazing Hiita" is removed from your side of the field.

name: Storming Wynn
text: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 WIND monster (except this card) to Special Summon 1 WIND monster from your hand. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed if "Storming Wynn" is removed from your side of the field.

name: Batteryman D
text: Your opponent cannot select a Thunder-Type monster you control as an attack target (except "Batteryman D").

name: Swift Birdman Joe
text: If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a WIND monster, return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the owners' hands.

name: Puppet Pawn
text: This card can attack directly. You can only use each of the following effects of "Puppet Pawn" once per turn. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 "Promotion" from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 EARTH Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Puppet Pawn", then your opponent can add 1 monster from their Deck to their hand.

name: Puppet Queen
text: When your opponent adds a monster(s) from the Main Deck to their hand, except by drawing it (and except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 EARTH Warrior monster from your hand or GY, and if you Special Summoned "Puppet King" by this effect, all EARTH Warrior monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK until the end of the next turn. You can only use this effect of "Puppet Queen" once per turn.

name: Puppet Rook
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can change this card to Defense Position, and if you do, send 1 EARTH Warrior monster from your Deck to your GY. Monsters your opponent controls that can attack must attack this card. Once per turn, when this card is targeted for an attack: You can target 1 Level 6 or higher EARTH Warrior monster in your GY; send this card from the field to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon that monster, then change the attack target to it.

name: Simorgh, Bird of Divinity
text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. If you Tribute Summon this card, all Tributes must be WIND. Each player takes 1000 damage during each of their End Phases, while this card remains face-up on the field. This damage is decreased by 500 for each Spell/Trap Card the player controls.

name: Sonic Shooter
text: If there are no cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, this card can attack your opponent directly. If it does, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is the original ATK of this card.

name: Puppet King
text: When your opponent adds a Monster Card(s) to their hand, except by drawing, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you do, destroy it during your next turn's End Phase.

name: Cyber Dinosaur
text: When your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand.

name: Elemental HERO Woodsman
text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

name: Elemental HERO Ocean
text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can target 1 "HERO" monster you control or in your Graveyard; return that target to the hand.

name: Expressroid
text: When this card is Summoned: You can target 2 "roid" monsters in your GY, except "Expressroid"; add those targets to your hand.

name: Ambulanceroid
text: When a "roid" monster is added from your Graveyard to your hand, you can Special Summon that monster.

name: Submarineroid
text: This card can attack your opponent directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is the original ATK of this card. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked or was attacked: You can change this card to Defense Position.

name: Stealthroid
text: If this card attacks, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card at the end of the Battle Phase if you control another "roid" monster.

name: Decoyroid
text: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select a face-up monster as an attack target except "Decoyroid".

name: Truckroid
text: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Equip the destroyed monster to this card. This card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of the monsters equipped to it by this effect.

name: Rescueroid
text: When a "roid" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can return that monster to its owner's hand.

name: Destiny HERO - Blade Master
text: During your opponent's Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; all "Destiny HERO" monsters you currently control gain 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Dasher
text: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other monster; this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. If this card attacks, change it to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. Once, while this card is in your GY, when you draw a monster during your Draw Phase: You can reveal it; Special Summon it. This card must be in the GY to activate and to resolve this effect.

name: Destiny HERO - Double Dude
text: Cannot be Special Summoned. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. During your Standby Phase, if this card was destroyed since your last Standby Phase: You can Special Summon 2 "Double Dude Tokens" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). This card must be in your Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

name: Destiny HERO - Defender
text: During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: Your opponent draws 1 card. This card must be in face-up Defense Position to activate and to resolve this effect.

name: Destiny HERO - Fear Monger
text: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was destroyed by battle and sent there since your last Standby Phase: Target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster in your GY, except "Destiny HERO - Fear Monger"; Special Summon that target.

name: Destiny HERO - Dogma
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters, including at least 1 "Destiny HERO" monster. Once per turn, if you still control this face-up card during your opponent's next Standby Phase after you Special Summoned it this way: Halve your opponent's LP.

name: Chrysalis Dolphin
text: By Tributing this card while "Neo Space" is on the field, Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin" from your hand or Deck.

name: Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin
text: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 monster. If you control a monster with ATK greater than or equal to the ATK of the chosen card, destroy the chosen card, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. Otherwise, take 500 damage.

name: Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird
text: Once per turn: You can gain 500 LP for each card in your opponent's hand.

name: Neo-Spacian Grand Mole
text: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can return both the opponent's monster and this card to the hand.

name: Neo-Spacian Glow Moss
text: If this card attacks or is attacked: Your opponent draws 1 card and shows it, then, based on its type apply this effect.●Monster: End the Battle Phase of this turn.●Spell: If this card is attacking, you can change it to a direct attack instead.●Trap: Change this card to Defense Position.

name: Neo-Spacian Dark Panther
text: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that monster's original name, also replace this effect with that monster's original effects (if any).

name: Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab
text: Gains 400 ATK for each Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

name: Black Stego
